works.description: Bang & Olufsen, the Danish provider of high-end audio and video products, has now added the new BeoVision 4 85-inch plasma TV to its prestigious home cinema family. The company’s first Full HD screen with 3D combines high-end audio, video and intelligent home integration, which the owners can control with the Beo6 remote control. The BeoVision 4 85-inch TV is the first from the house to include 3D technology using active shutter glasses, and its Automatic Colour Management helps delivers excellent picture quality.
